name: Daily life of DIG
description:
A simple 2D scroller story driven game for GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam with provided theme "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING".

Controller : 

[A][D] = Move left/right

[I] = Interact with surrounding object

[R] = Restart Game

[ESC] = Quit Game

Follow the regular life of DIG.

The game has no sound...
